meta.name: viewport

form.name: form1

div.div: The New Richmond Schools, in partnership with parents and community, provides all students with a comprehensive educational experience in a safe and nurturing environment, preparing them for the highest levels of personal achievement with the ability to demonstrate confidence, leadership and responsibility.

Committed to Excellence.
Passionate for Innovative Learning.
Engaging Tomorrow’s Leaders.

In New Richmond Schools all learners will experience…
> A high quality, well rounded learning program.
> Relevant and current opportunities that encourage ownership for learning.
> Access to real world resources.
> A supportive, respectful environment that values integrity, builds relationships, and addresses each student’s diverse needs.
> Opportunity to cultivate knowledge networks to become college and career ready.
> High, measurable expectations for success before and following graduation.

h3.a: Board of Education Meeting/Closed to Public/Watch on Facebook Live
Last Day for Students/End of Fourth Quarter
Ms. Senter named WARM 98 Teacher of the Week

div.span: Congratulations to New Richmond High School English teacher Michelle Senter on being named the WARM 98.5 FM Teacher of the Week for April 10.

h3.a: Superintendent Miller: Open enrollment begins April 15
Schools are closed, NREVSD meal service continues

div.span: Carryout food is not the specialty of most local school cafeterias. In this era of COVID-19 and stay-at-home orders, all that's changed. See how New Richmond Schools pivoted to continue to provide breakfast/lunch to students.

h3.a: Mercy Health message regarding student athletes

div.span: Mercy Health announces a change in how it treats and cares for student athletes.
